headline: Why National Grid Stock Deserves a Spot in Your Portfolio Right Now
summary: NGG is a strong investment choice, given its earnings growth estimates, consistent capital spending plan and large-scale renewable energy projects.

headline: The Power She Brings: Entergy Texas Celebrates International Women in Engineering Day
